briefTitle: A Long Term Study of GK530G in Subjects With Acne Vulgaris
officialTitle: A Long Term Study of GK530G in Subjects With Acne Vulgaris

interventions.name: GK530G
otherNames: Fixed-dose combination gel of Adapalene and Benzoyl Peroxide

summary: This open label study is to determine the safety profile of GK530G in a long-term treatment (up to 12 months) in subjects with acne vulgaris and to evaluate the efficacy of GK530G in a long-term treatment.
